title: Snapchat launches a new lens to help you learn American Sign Language
content:
Snapchat has been around for over a decade now. Despite many social media platforms copying some of its core features, it still manages to come up with new ideas and implement original features. It’s true that it might not be as relevant today as it was in past years. However, it still has a solid

The post Snapchat launches a new lens to help you learn American Sign Language appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Snapchat has launched a new lens to help users learn American Sign Language (ASL) through AR. It works on iOS and Android phones.
